original_body_lines: A 62-year-old person was shot dead at his residence in Kadawara North, Kokgalla, Ambalantota this morning, the Police said.
According to the Police, three individuals who had come to the victim's house shot him dead and left the area.
Police said that initial investigations had revealed that one of the individuals had also looked out for the victim's son as well during the raid.
The daughter-in-law of the victim who had seen the assailants had screamed following which the victim had come out from the back door of the house with a torch to see what was going on.
Soon after the victim came out of the door, he was shot dead by the assailants, who fled the house after the shooting.
